body: @Ladiff Yes, you're right. But that doesn't mean you shouldn't complain about it. I agree with mailforporn here. It's extremely rare to find a doujin without any sexism and these cliché gender roles.
@mailforporn dude y'know this site has full of sexists and homophobic right? dont pay attention to comments lol

if the girl were the one expressing confidence in her sex skills due to previous experience, the comments would be swarming with negative feedback. but when the man does it, it's all right? humans are weird... anyway, i'll go ahead and say it - i didn't like that part. its ok if he had experience, but its not ok to be boasting about it in my opinion.
this is so damn underrated... it's like within my 10 first doujins I've ever read... still come back to this since I love it so much omg
